xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.6 Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaduka » 5.6.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
117.
1883Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayuttaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… . (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
1884Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
1885Ganthagocchakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
